remarks: The set of all ` N ` x ` N ` diagonal matrices over (the ring) ` R ` is the base set of the algebra of ` N ` x ` N ` diagonal matrices over (the ring) ` R ` .  (Contributed by AV, 8-Dec-2019.)
statement:
dmatbas.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
dmatbas.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
dmatbas.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
dmatbas.d $e |- D = ( N DMat R ) $.
dmatbas $p |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> D = ( Base ` ( N DMatALT R ) ) ) $.
